welcome_message_body: Welcome to Florence, where Southern charm meets rich history and natural beauty. Take in the quaint streets, historic architecture, and vibrant arts scene as you explore all the city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Chen's Family Dish
restaurants.description: Chen's Family Dish is a chinese restaurant located in Florence.

restaurants.name: Fresh Harvest Cafe
restaurants.description: Fresh Harvest Cafe is a café located in Florence.

restaurants.name: A&W Restaurant
restaurants.description: A&W Restaurant is a fast food restaurant located in Florence.

restaurants.name: Ichiban Restaurant
restaurants.description: Ichiban Restaurant is a japanese restaurant located in Florence.

restaurants.name: Rosa's Mexican Restaurant
restaurants.description: Rosa's Mexican Restaurant is a mexican restaurant located in Florence.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Florence Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Florence Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo transportation.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dillon Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Dillon Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
